statements: UPDATE attendance_data SET attendance_count = 100 WHERE event_id = 1;
UPDATE attendance_data SET event_name = 'Meeting' WHERE event_id = 2;
UPDATE attendance_data SET attendance_count = 100 WHERE event_id = 1;
UPDATE attendance_data SET event_name = 'Annual Conference', event_date = '2022-09-15' WHERE event_id = 2;
UPDATE virtual_lectures SET lecture_name = 'Advanced SQL' WHERE lecture_id = 1;
UPDATE attendance_records SET attendance_status = true, participation_points = 10 WHERE record_id = 5;
UPDATE virtual_lectures SET start_time = '2022-09-15 08:00:00', end_time = '2022-09-15 09:30:00' WHERE lecture_id = 101;
UPDATE attendance_records SET attendance_status = TRUE, participation_points = 10 WHERE student_id = 201 AND lecture_id = 101;
UPDATE LectureAttendees SET attendance_status = TRUE WHERE lecture_id = 101 AND student_id = 201;
UPDATE WebinarAttendees SET join_time = '2022-06-30 10:00:00' WHERE webinar_id = 301 AND attendee_id = 401;
UPDATE LectureAttendees SET attendance_status = TRUE, participation_score = 95 WHERE lecture_id = 123 AND student_id = 456;
UPDATE WebinarAttendees SET join_time = '2022-01-15 10:30:00', leave_time = '2022-01-15 12:00:00' WHERE webinar_id = 789 AND attendee_id = 321;
UPDATE Lectures SET presenter_name = 'John Doe', participants_count = 50 WHERE lecture_id = 1;
UPDATE Webinars SET attendees_count = 100, webinar_topic = 'New Topic' WHERE webinar_id = 3;
UPDATE Lectures SET participants_count = participants_count + 10 WHERE lecture_id = 101;
UPDATE Attendance SET attendance_status = 'Present' WHERE event_id = 201 AND participant_id = 301;
UPDATE virtual_lecture_attendance SET attendance_status = TRUE WHERE lecture_id = 101 AND participant_id = 1;
UPDATE webinar_participation SET participation_score = 85 WHERE participant_id = 5;
UPDATE virtual_lecture_attendance SET attendance_status = TRUE WHERE lecture_id = 101 AND participant_name = 'Alice';
UPDATE webinar_participation SET participation_score = 85, participant_name = 'Bob' WHERE webinar_id = 201;
